mapper.insert: insert into t_seller_brand (seller_id, brand_id, submit_date, status, audit_status, audit_date, audit_by_name, audit_content, auth_type, auth_start_date, auth_end_date, categories, trademark_cert, other_cert, auth_cert, login_name, co_name ) values (#{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{authStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{authEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trademarkCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_seller_brand set seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, submit_date = #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, audit_date = #{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_by_name = #{auditByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_content = #{auditContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_type = #{authType,jdbcType=CHAR}, auth_start_date = #{authStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auth_end_date = #{authEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, categories = #{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trademark_cert = #{trademarkCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_cert = #{otherCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_cert = #{authCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, co_name = #{coName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seller_brand_id = #{sellerBrandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_seller_brand
seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
submit_date = #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
audit_date = #{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_by_name = #{auditByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_content = #{auditContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auth_type = #{authType,jdbcType=CHAR},
auth_start_date = #{authStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
auth_end_date = #{authEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where seller_brand_id = #{sellerBrandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_brand where exists (select 1 from t_seller_brand where t_seller_brand.brand_id = t_brand.brand_id and t_seller_brand.seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t_seller_brand.status = '1' )

select t1.seller_brand_id, t1.seller_id, t1.brand_id, t1.submit_date, t1.status, t1.audit_status, t1.audit_date, t1.audit_by_name, t1.audit_content, t1.auth_type, t1.auth_start_date, t1.auth_end_date, t1.categories, t1.trademark_cert, t1.other_cert, t1.auth_cert, t1.login_name, t1.co_name, t2.brand_name, t2.brand_ename, t2.logo_url, t2.brand_abbr from t_seller_brand t1, t_brand t2 where t1.brand_id = t2.brand_id and t1.seller_id = #{sellerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t1.status != '0' order by t1.seller_brand_id desc
